item.title: Alpine to Sway
item.description: Alpine Linux with Sway Bash, Text Editor Packages apk add vim bash Create Non Root User Packages apk add sudo shadow Command Add User useradd -m -G wheel -s /bin/bash <user_name> passwd <user_name> sudo file EDITOR=vim visudo # Make wheel group can use sudo Setup eudev setup-devd udev GPU Intel apk add mesa-dri-gallium AMD Read here Nvidia Read here PAM apk add linux-pam shadow-login Elogind apk add elogind polkit-elogind dbus
